title: [Soraka Heal Malfunction?]
body: Just played an aram and every time i heal a teammate, it takes away from my own health. I read all of her abilities and didn't see anywhere that it says that is supposed to happen... and no i wasn't being attacked, i tested it out multiple times safely behind my turret where no one else was... it did this the entire game, am i missing something?

replies.body:
http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/soraka/

Astral Infusion

 Cost: **10% Max Health**, 20/25/30/35/40 Mana
Range: 550

Soraka** sacrifices a portion of her own Health** to heal another friendly unit.

As her **(W) Astral Infusion states**, "*Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own Health to heal another friendly unit.*" 

This is intended behavior. :]
I was gonna play along too
oh dear, i was hoping for a comment like this xD i guess you stopped playing her for a while uhu?
